definition: to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip

sentences.english: The audiences enjoyed the moon and the lanterns while solving the riddles in a relaxed way.
sentences.chinese: 中秋夜人们将谜条张贴在各种花灯之上，赏月猜谜。

sentences.english: They also can be able to re-edit the post even after posting it.
sentences.chinese: 他们还可以能够重新编辑，即使它张贴的职位。

sentences.english: I saw this picture and couldn't resist posting it.
sentences.chinese: 我看到这张图片便不由自主地把它张贴出来。

sentences.english: Pull a brief informal note to be his paste the enlightenment that find a person, before long somebody claim ladle.
sentences.chinese: 拉条子为他张贴了寻人启示，不久有人认领了勺子。

sentences.english: R. 1. Has the discipline plan posted when the students arrive on the first day of school.
sentences.chinese: 在学生到校的第一天就把班规张贴出来。

sentences.english: The site claimed it was not responsible for the content of materials that users posted on its site.
sentences.chinese: 它声明对用户在其网站张贴的内容概不负责。

sentences.english: Finally, people will paste paper-cut with cat or tiger shapes on the door of silkworm rearing rooms.
sentences.chinese: 最后在蚕室的大门上张贴猫虎形剪纸。

sentences.english: This information will be posted to the Panasonic LUMIX Global Site soon very soon.
sentences.chinese: 此信息将被张贴到松下Lumix全球网站很快很快。

sentences.english: Old movie posters hung on the walls of Cal’s apartment.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔公寓的墙上张贴着老电影海报。

sentences.english: IMO signs for fire-fighting shall post to the places according to the rules.
sentences.chinese: 消防标识应该按照相应的规范要求张贴。

sentences.english: DO not post links that are dead or links that have no relation to the job search website.
sentences.chinese: 请勿张贴死链接或链接有没有求职网站的关系。

sentences.english: The amount of the small and big blinds and antes and who is posting them.
sentences.chinese: 小，大盲注和底注，谁是它们张贴金额。

sentences.english: A copy of the letter was posted on the noticeboard .
sentences.chinese: 布告牌上张贴了这封信的内容。

sentences.english: Caxton posted small printed notices along London's main streets.
sentences.chinese: 卡克斯顿沿着伦敦的主要街道张贴小型的印刷广告。

sentences.english: Sonus and Cisco continue to be the strongest challengers posting substantial growth in NAM and EMEA, respectively.
sentences.chinese: 思科仍是最强的挑战者张贴大幅增长，将由南分别。

sentences.english: They placarded all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 他们在全国到处张贴布告。

definition: model or template character/written slogan or phrase/mention (e.g. "air mail" 航空 on a letter, "first draft" 初稿 on a document etc)
to set up a vendor's stand
